EmailTemplate.name: EU OB: Bienvenue chez SunPower FR
EmailTemplate.subject: Bienvenue chez SunPower
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName}:
Thank you for making the choice to partner with SunPower. We are very excited to work with you through our North American Residential Dealer Program. As a Partner Experience Manager with SunPower, I will be available to assist you as you come up to speed with our solar solutions and business processes.
We have a Dealer Portal that provides access to design tools, program guidelines, our MRC (Marketing Resource Center), the SunPower University, etc. As part of our partner 'on boarding' process, we can help you create profiles in the portal. These would include users needing full access, and other that are primarily learners - looking for documents, content and training. We have attached an Excel file that can be used to communicate this user information to us. The Training Liaison will be able to enroll your employees in instructor lead courses. You can also call 1-800-SUNPOWER for assistance with enrollment. The Portal Champion can grant access to the dealer portal. You can return this completed form via e-mail.
If you have not yet applied for credit and wish to do so, please click on the following link in order to complete the credit application: http://sunpower.force.com/partners/creditapp_1?Aid={!Account.Id}. You can also apply for credit directly through the Portal via the tab on the far right of the portal screen. Please ensure that your credit application is returned with a copy of your financial statements. If you are submitting a personal guaranty, please take note that the personal guaranty must be notarized and the original must be sent to:
SunPower Corporation Attn: Credit Department/Johnny Spain 77 Rio Robles San Jose, CA 95134
If you have any questions in regard to the credit application, please contact us at 1-800-SUNPOWER or via e-mail at credit@sunpowercorp.com. Should you have any other questions, do not hesitate to contact me at either of the numbers noted below.
Regards,
Mei Juknelis Partner Ambassador Manager Residential and Light Commercial Business Unit
145 Rio Robles San Jose, CA 95134 Phone: 408.240.5580 Fax: 408.240.5400 www.sunpowercorp.com
